Package net.sf.mmm.service.api.command

Contains the API for simple remote services using command style.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RemoteInvocationCommand<RESULT>
    This is the interface for a command that represents a specific operation of a RemoteInvocationService.
    RemoteInvocationCommandHandler<RESULT extends Serializable,COMMAND extends RemoteInvocationCommand<RESULT>>
    This is the interface for the handler of a specific RemoteInvocationCommand.

Package net.sf.mmm.service.api.command Description

Contains the API for simple remote services using command style.

Service API Command

This package and it sub-packages contain the API for RemoteInvocationCommands. See net.sf.mmm.service.api for further details.
